title: Stedsm
author: Stedsm
content: Hey guys, I'm pasting some text from a prop firm's discord as they're looking for a graphic designer. I believe this will prove to be a great opportunity for the one who gets selected.QuoteJOB POSTING We are hiring for a Graphic DesignerPlease review the job posting below and follow instructions in order to qualify https://forms.clickup.com/20540351/f/kjuxz-5530/VP3FI5RQZRWDEW6LLFGreat opportunity for anyone that is a talented illustrator or graphic designerThis application will close April 1st and then we will contact everyone who submitted an application to let them know if we will move forward with and interview. @everyone@jayce I'd personally prefer that you try this out for sure.Below is their discord if you'd like to join there and apply:https://discord.gg/yP8e2jZzrWThe best part: They pay in crypto too and BTC is included

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: That's cool Stedsm! Thank you very much for recommending me to the work opportunity  Tbh I'm not a good illustrator and seems they have more works for illustration stuff but I would likely give a try since the deadline is April 1st. Beside that, the requirement to qualify is quite unique by asking the applicants to redesign some of their images. It's perfect for anyone who have skills but doesn't have a portfolio yet. Good luck guys!

comments.author: Stedsm
comments.body: Quote from: jayce on March 22, 2023, 06:04:20 PMThat's cool Stedsm! Thank you very much for recommending me to the work opportunity  Tbh I'm not a good illustrator and seems they have more works for illustration stuff but I would likely give a try since the deadline is April 1st. Beside that, the requirement to qualify is quite unique by asking the applicants to redesign some of their images. It's perfect for anyone who have skills but doesn't have a portfolio yet. Good luck guys!Sure buddy, please go for it. I just want that this forum's members get a chance outside as well so that they can excel at other places and be able to make a new portfolio through this and also showcase their work through the same. After all, small things can make a huge difference.
